Summary.article: 저는 디지털 미디어 이론, 현대 미디어 기술, 네트워크 엔지니어링과 같은 분야에서 활동하고 있는 아티스트, 디자이너, 게임 디자이너, 풀스택 개발자, 사운드 엔지니어, 그리고 인터랙티브 분야에서 연구를 진행하는 학자입니다.

Education.schoolDegree01: 인터랙티브 아트 학사, 게임 아트 부전공

Experience.title01: 2024(접수대기중): 엔터테인먼트의 미래, 2024년 제 9회 미디어와 대량 상호작용 국제 컨퍼런스.
Experience.article01: Media trends stress rethinking digital interaction's role, now vital for entertainment, focusing on performative and interactive engagement.
Experience.title03: 2024: My Web Page Full-stack Website Development
Experience.title04: 2024: Get Into GRBWB MICA: GMDItch.io Repo
Experience.article04: A 2D Unity game where players navigate colored areas within time limits. It includes 'start', 'level', and 'end' scenes, space bar navigation, and uses RigidBody2D and Polygon Collider 2D for movement.
Experience.title05: 2024: Libramentum Full-stack Website DevelopmentGitHub Repo
Experience.article05: The website was built with HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript without frameworks. It's hosted on AWS EC2, using an Apache server on RedHat 9 Linux. The firewall is managed by Firewalld, and HTTPS is secured through ZeroSSL.
Experience.article06: Live DJing performance with Traktor Pro 3. MIDI controller was utilized.
Experience.title07: 2024: The V-Tuber Wave Convergence: The International Journal of Research into New Media Technologies
Experience.article07: The analysis reviews V-Tubing's evolution and future in key nations, focusing on major platforms like Japan's Hololive, South Korea's ISEGYE IDOL, and the USA's Shylily.
Experience.title08: 2023: Web Tetris MICA: IA221P5.JS Editor
Experience.article08: Developed a Tetris game with efficient block management and movement using a double for loop for the board, and dynamic falling block movement based on shape and index, improving data handling and movement accuracy.
Experience.title09: 2023: Tactic of game design Korea Game Society 2023 Spring Conference (pp. 3-10)
Experience.article09: The study explores game concepts through history and philosophy, merging Heidegger's art philosophy with Juul's game model to understand games' interactive nature.
Experience.title10: 2023: Where is your home? MICA: FF
Experience.title11: 2023: Material of Color Design MICA: FF
Experience.title12: 2023: Spooky Game: shoot the pumpkin RCAD: VRD
Experience.article12: Solly created an Oculus 2 FPS game in UE4 where players shoot pumpkin head balloons spawning every 3 seconds with a pistol. Balloon speed varies by level and missing them costs a chance. The game uses three Blueprint Actors: gun, balloons, and map.
Experience.title14: 2022: Escape the server room RCAD: GA
Experience.article20: PBR hand modeling with ZBrush. Z Layer, Z Sphere, Maya 2023 was utilized.
Experience.article21: First Maya modeling project with isometric pixel concept art.
Experience.title22: 2024: The P2P Live-Streaming Module Design IEEE TEMSCON 2024: Disruptive Technologies Trends. Article 10
Experience.article22: The paper examines how P2P and blockchain technologies affect the streaming sector, citing Twitch Korea's shutdown over higher fees. It presents a P2P streaming solution promoting Net Neutrality, using DNS seeding and innovative methods to build a strong system with key components like 'Regional Pool' and 'Witness Node

Summary.article: I am an artist, designer, game designer, full-stack developer, sound engineer, and a scholar conducting research in interactive fields. I am active in areas such as digital media theory, contemporary media technology, and network engineering.

Education.schoolDegree01: BFA in Interactive Art, minor in game art
Education.school02: Ringling College of Art and Design (RCAD)
